archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.1.1c: c) specialised security-related functions (e.g. a business continuity function, the data protection unit, a threat intelligence capability or a security assurance team).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
